statements: SELECT employee_id, employee_name, skill_name, skill_level FROM EmployeeSkillsInventory WHERE skill_level > 3;
SELECT skill_name, skill_category, employee_name FROM EmployeeSkillsInventory WHERE skill_category = 'Programming';
SELECT * FROM EmployeeSkillsInventory WHERE employee_id = 1001;
SELECT skill_name, skill_level FROM EmployeeSkillsInventory WHERE skill_level BETWEEN 2 AND 4;
SELECT skill_category, COUNT(skill_category) AS total_skills FROM EmployeeSkillsInventory GROUP BY skill_category;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeSkillsInventory WHERE skill_level > 3 ORDER BY employee_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT employee_name, skill_name, skill_level FROM EmployeeSkillsInventory WHERE skill_category = 'Programming' ORDER BY skill_level DESC, employee_name;
SELECT DISTINCT skill_category FROM EmployeeSkillsInventory;
SELECT employee_name, COUNT(skill_name) AS total_skills FROM EmployeeSkillsInventory GROUP BY employee_name HAVING COUNT(skill_name) >= 3 ORDER BY total_skills DESC;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, skill_name, skill_level FROM EmployeeSkillsInventory WHERE skill_level BETWEEN 2 AND 4 ORDER BY employee_id, employee_name DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM skills_inventory WHERE skill_level > 3;
SELECT employee_name, skill_name FROM skills_inventory WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM training_progress WHERE progress_status = 'completed' ORDER BY completion_date DESC;
SELECT employee_name, skill_name, skill_level FROM skills_inventory ORDER BY skill_level DESC;
SELECT employee_id, skill_id FROM training_progress WHERE employee_id = 2 AND progress_status = 'in_progress';
SELECT employee_name, skill_name, skill_level FROM skills_inventory WHERE skill_level > 3
SELECT * FROM training_progress WHERE completion_date >= '2021-08-01' ORDER BY employee_id DESC
SELECT employee_name, skill_name, progress_status FROM skills_inventory JOIN training_progress ON skills_inventory.employee_id = training_progress.employee_id WHERE progress_status = 'completed'
SELECT employee_name, skill_name, progress_status, completion_date FROM skills_inventory FULL OUTER JOIN training_progress ON skills_inventory.employee_id = training_progress.employee_id
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT skill_id) AS total_skills, AVG(skill_level) AS average_skill_level FROM skills_inventory GROUP BY employee_id HAVING average_skill_level > 2
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT id, name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT name, email FROM employees ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM skills WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT employee_id, skill_id, progress_percentage FROM training_progress WHERE progress_percentage > 50;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT name, department FROM employees WHERE department='Finance';
SELECT name, department, email FROM employees WHERE department='HR' AND id > 5;
SELECT e.name AS employee_name, s.name AS skill_name, tp.progress_percentage FROM employees e JOIN training_progress tp ON e.id = tp.employee_id JOIN skills s ON tp.skill_id = s.id;

SELECT e.name AS employee_name, s.name AS skill_name, tp.progress_percentage FROM employees e LEFT JOIN training_progress tp ON e.id = tp.employee_id LEFT JOIN skills s ON tp.skill_id = s.id WHERE tp.progress_percentage > 50;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM skills ORDER BY skill_name DESC;
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(skill_id) as num_skills FROM employee_skills GROUP BY employee_id HAVING num_skills > 2;
SELECT employee_name, training_date, training_duration FROM employees INNER JOIN training_progress ON employees.employee_id = training_progress.employee_id WHERE training_description LIKE '%SQL%';
SELECT employee_name, department, training_description FROM employees LEFT JOIN training_progress ON employees.employee_id = training_progress.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM employees ORDER BY employee_name DESC, start_date ASC
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT'
SELECT employee_name, department, skill_name FROM employees JOIN employee_skills ON employees.employee_id = employee_skills.employee_id JOIN skills ON employee_skills.skill_id = skills.skill_id
SELECT employee_name, SUM(training_duration) AS total_training_duration FROM employees JOIN training_progress ON employees.employee_id = training_progress.employee_id GROUP BY employee_name

SELECT employee_name, department, skill_name, proficiency_level FROM employees JOIN employee_skills ON employees.employee_id = employee_skills.employee_id JOIN skills ON employee_skills.skill_id = skills.skill_id WHERE proficiency_level > 3 ORDER BY department
SELECT * FROM employee_skills;
SELECT employee_name, skill FROM employee_skills WHERE proficiency_level > 3;
SELECT employee_name, skill, proficiency_level FROM employee_skills ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT employee_name, skill, proficiency_level FROM employee_skills ORDER BY proficiency_level DESC;
SELECT employee_name, skill, proficiency_level FROM employee_skills WHERE skill='Programming';
SELECT * FROM employee_skills;
SELECT employee_name, skill, proficiency_level FROM employee_skills;
SELECT employee_name, skill FROM employee_skills WHERE proficiency_level > 3;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, skill, proficiency_level FROM employee_skills ORDER BY proficiency_level DESC;

SELECT employee_name, program_name, completion_date FROM employee_training_records INNER JOIN training_programs ON employee_training_records.program_id = training_programs.program_id INNER JOIN employee_skills ON employee_training_records.employee_id = employee_skills.employee_id;
